[i](As the condition is met for the first time each turn, add a deed counter. Stop when the deed is done.)[/i]
It’s your end step and you haven’t cast a spell this turn.
I – Draw two cards.
II – Discard a card.
Deed – Once during each opponent’s turn, you may cast a spell with mana value 3 or less without paying its mana cost and as though it had flash.
